name: Typhlosion
author: Ken Sugimori
flavor_text: It has a secret, devastating move. It rubs its blazing fur together to cause huge explosions.

abilities.name: Fire Boost
abilities.effect: When you play Typhlosion from your hand, you may flip a coin. If heads, search your deck for up to 4 {R} Energy cards and attach them to Typhlosion. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Flame Wheel
attacks.effect: Discard 3 {R} Energy cards attached to Typhlosion in order to use this attack. Do 20 damage to each Benched Pokémon (yours and your opponent’s). (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
